tool_description: Producteev is the leading social task management solution for teams. It’s helped thousands of teams get work done faster and more effectively. It's brought to you by Jive, the world's # 1 social business provider.
name: Producteev
title: Producteev

api_list.name: Add a restricted project to a network invitation
api_list.description: Add a restricted project to a network invitation so the user joining the invitation will join the restricted project automatically. This Method will return the list of restricted Projects attached to the Invitations

api_list.name: Upload a remote file
api_list.description: To create a file object from a remote source you need to POST a JSON object prefixed by "remoteFile" and containing the "url" and "fileName".
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-producteev.p.rapidapi.com/upload/remotefiles"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-producteev.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Create a new label on the network
api_list.description: To create a Label, you need to POST a JSON label object containing the "title", "foreground_color", "background_color" for creation only you also need to send the id of the network in which you wanna create the label in.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-producteev.p.rapidapi.com/labels"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-producteev.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Invite a user to join the network. You can use the user id or an email address
api_list.description: In order to invite a user on a network, you need to create a Network Invitation. You need to specify the targetUser (or an email address), the network and the type (@see list below).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-producteev.p.rapidapi.com/network_invitations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-producteev.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://community-producteev.p.rapidapi.com/network_invitations"

headers = {

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-producteev.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Upload a local file
api_list.description: To create a file object from a local source you need to POST the file using the classic Multipart/form-data. The key for the uploaded data must be "file".

api_list.name: Re-send the email for a network invitation
api_list.description: Re-send the email for a network invitation. This call works only if the invitation has the status network_invitation.status = 'pending'
